metadata.instructions: Claude: enumerate distinct meanings for each word, and fill the 'meanings' array below with entries conforming to the schema in CLAUDE.md and config.json (meaning_entry).

meanings.MeaningContext: Physical starting point of movement or location
meanings.MonolingualDef: Indica el punto de partida físico de un movimiento o ubicación
meanings.ExampleSentence: El hombre viene desde Londres en el tren
meanings.GappedSentence: El hombre viene _____ Londres en el tren
meanings.prompt: A brown guy with long hair coming off the train to greet his guy and girl friends.

meanings.MeaningContext: Time when something began and continues
meanings.MonolingualDef: Marca el momento en el pasado cuando algo comenzó y continúa
meanings.ExampleSentence: Esperamos desde las seis de la tarde
meanings.GappedSentence: Esperamos _____ las seis de la tarde
meanings.prompt: It's dark outside, everyone is lying on the station floor waiting for the train with a large clock on the wall.

meanings.MeaningContext: Refers to something neuter, not close to speaker
meanings.MonolingualDef: Se refiere a algo neutro que no está cerca del hablante
meanings.ExampleSentence: Eso fue increíble en la ceremonia
meanings.prompt: A young bald guy with small round glasses in a suit giving a speach at an awards ceremony.

meanings.MonolingualDef: Conecta alternativas negativas y refuerza la negación
meanings.ExampleSentence: No puedo comer ni pasta ni pan
meanings.prompt: On the dinner table a bowl of steaming pasta and a french bagette.

meanings.MeaningContext: Reaching a destination or achieving something
meanings.MonolingualDef: Alcanzar un destino o lograr algo
meanings.ExampleSentence: El avión va a llegar a San Francisco
meanings.GappedSentence: El avión va a _____ a San Francisco
meanings.prompt: A large plane landing at a runway in San Fransico, a bald young man with small round glasses at the window.
